posts.content:
Engine spec
2176cc Stateside Tuning Stroker
H duty ali crankcase, clearanced for stroker crankshaft
oil galleys drilled & tapped for internal cleaning
bored to 94mm, surface decked barrel seat area
fitted with case savers
78mm {en430} forged 1 piece crankshaft
8 dowelled German steel std weight flywheel
steel 5lb equaliser crank pulley
Scatt 5500" forged rod set with arp bolts
Engle 110 cam
Scat lightened d cam followers
Gene Berg oil pump, cnc oil pump cover
Mahle forged pistons
1700lb KEP clutch
fully balanced crank/flywheel/ equaliser pulley
CB Magnum 40X35 sport heads with springs set to 210lb at ful cam lift
M series valve springs
Jay Cee spring loaded pushrod tubes
Cortux H duty rear main oil seal
Autocraft soild centre bolt up rocker shaft set
Scat swivel foot tappet adjusters
Manton cro-moly pushrods, cut to length
8.3 compression
full flow engine, remote oil filter & 19 row mocal cooler.
Twin 40 Dells jetted to suit.

£3000 located in Manchester
you gone turbo billy

Nope stock

yeah right!!!

anyway, back to the point of the thread.... hup for a nice lump.
Mmmmmm....and I've just blown my lump to bits.
Still forsale. Made 95 BHP AT THE WHEELS on the Raceshack dyno (cant find print outs ). Built by Stateside Tuning bought at Vanfest 2006, i reckon its covered 20-25K miles max.
